activitylogs.ActivityLogAPI.title: ActivityLogAPI represents the API response format for activity logs

agent.ActionButton.title: ActionButton represents an interactive button in the response

agent.ButtonParams.title: ButtonParams represents the parameters for an action button

agent.ContextData.title: ContextData represents the data stored in conversation context

agent.RadioOption.title: RadioOption represents a single radio button option

agent.StationData.title: StationData represents a charging station in the response

attachments.Attachment.title: Attachment represents a file attachment stored in GCS with metadata in MongoDB

attachments.EntityType.title: EntityType represents the type of entity an attachment belongs to

attractions.Address.title: Address represents the structured address format

address.title: Structured address from Google Places API

attractions.Attraction.title: Attraction represents a nearby attraction stored in MongoDB

attractions.PlacePhoto.title: PlacePhoto represents photo data for a place

auth.User.title: User represents a user in the system

bookings.Booking.title: Booking represents a charging station booking

credits.Credit.title: Credit represents a single credit entry

credits.UserCreditsAPI.title: UserCreditsAPI represents the API response structure

devices.DeviceAPI.title: DeviceAPI represents the API response format for devices

mail.EmailLog.title: EmailLog represents an email record in the database

maps.Location.title: Common request/response types for our API

icon.title: Optional custom icon for distinguishing marker types

metadata.ActiveCreditPack.title: ActiveCreditPack represents the simplified response structure for active packs

metadata.ContactData.title: ContactData represents contact information in the app config

metadata.CreditPackAPI.title: CreditPackAPI represents the API response structure

metadata.EarnPointAPI.title: EarnPointAPI represents the API response format for earn points rules

metadata.EligibilityCriteria.description: This can vary between different offers

metadata.FAQ.title: FAQ represents a frequently asked question document

collection

metadata.MetaVehicleResponse.title: MetaVehicleResponse is the API response type that Encore can serialize

displayTag.title: Short UI tag for vertical display

metadata.OfferUsage.title: OfferUsage represents an offer usage record

metadata.RewardCatalogAPI.title: RewardCatalogAPI represents the API response format for reward catalog items

metadata.TimeWindow.title: TimeWindow represents a time range for offer validity

metadata.VehicleChargingRequest.description: Type-specific: cars use AC/DC, two-wheelers use 0-80/0-100
metadata.VehicleChargingRequest.title: VehicleChargingRequest represents charging data in API requests

metadata.VehicleChargingResponse.description: Contains all possible fields; only type-specific fields are populated based on vehicleType
metadata.VehicleChargingResponse.title: VehicleChargingResponse represents charging data in API responses

metadata.VehicleRangeRequest.description: Fields are type-specific: cars only use rangeKm, two-wheelers can include mode variants
metadata.VehicleRangeRequest.title: VehicleRangeRequest represents range data in API requests

metadata.VehicleRangeResponse.description: Contains all possible fields; only type-specific fields are populated based on vehicleType
metadata.VehicleRangeResponse.title: VehicleRangeResponse represents range data in API responses

metadata.VehicleSpecificationsRequest.description: Type-specific: cars require motorPowerKW and chargingPort Two-wheelers require chargingAtHome and chargingAtStation
metadata.VehicleSpecificationsRequest.title: VehicleSpecificationsRequest represents specifications in API requests

metadata.VehicleSpecificationsResponse.description: Contains all possible fields; only type-specific fields are populated based on vehicleType
metadata.VehicleSpecificationsResponse.title: VehicleSpecificationsResponse represents specifications in API responses

notifications.UserNotificationAPI.title: UserNotificationAPI represents the API response format for user notifications

primitive.ObjectID.title: ObjectID is the BSON ObjectID type.

information

coordinates.title: [longitude, latitude] order as per GeoJSON standard

type.title: Must be "Point" for GeoJSON Point format

routes.GeoLocation.title: GeoLocation represents a geographical location with coordinates

totalJourneyTime.title: Total journey time (travel + charging) in minutes

calculations for planning

PlanCandidateRoute represents a route alternative from Google Maps Directions

PlanChargingStop represents a planned charging stop during the route for

PlanInterestStop represents a planned interest stop during the route for
planning

planning

scoring for planning

PlanRouteAnalyticsSummary is a lightweight view for listing analytics (excludes
heavy APIResponse and full ConsoleLogs to avoid bufio.Scanner token-too-long in
Encore dashboard).

routes.PlanVehicleSpecs.title: PlanVehicleSpecs represents vehicle specifications for planning

sessions.TimelineEvent.title: TimelineEvent represents a single event in the session timeline

fields for streaming

User status: active, inactive, signed_in, logged_out, account_deleted,
suspended, banned, guest, blocked, other

GetDevices returns all devices in the system

post.description: 1\. If userid not present in ev\_user\_devices, just add entry 2. If userid present, check for device token present in that userid's document. If not present, add another document for same userid and different device info and token 3. If userid and token both are present, check if there is any other device field need to be updated

GetDevicesByTokenType returns all devices with a specific token type

notifications

role.

operationIds

operationIds

post.description: 1\. Syncs all APIs from OpenAPI & private annotations into the SuperAdmin document. 2. Adds the specified operationId to the requested role (User/Admin). 3. Refreshes the in-memory permissions cache for that role.
post.summary: SyncAndAssignAPIToRole runs the full flow needed to add an API to a role:

SyncAPIsToDatabase extracts all API endpoints from openapi.json and stores them
in MongoDB

without transformation

delete.summary: DeleteUserProfileStatus removes a user profile status from the system

get.summary: GetUserProfileStatus returns the profile status for a specific user

put.summary: UpdateHasSeenDroplets updates the hasSeenDroplets field for a specific user
UpdateProfileStep updates a specific step in the user's profile status

post.summary: CreateIssue creates a new user issue

get.summary: GetIssues retrieves issues with optional filters

GetAppSuggestionIssues retrieves only issues of type App Suggestions with
optional filters
GetUserIssues retrieves issues for a specific user

delete.summary: DeleteIssue deletes an issue by ID

get.summary: GetIssue retrieves a specific issue by ID

put.summary: UpdateIssue updates an existing issue
AssignIssue assigns an issue to a user
ResolveIssue resolves an issue with resolution notes

get.summary: GetUsers returns all users in the system

post.summary: CreateUser creates a new user with Clerk authentication

delete.summary: DeleteUser deletes a specific user by their ID

userStatus.title:
User status: active, inactive, signed_in, logged_out, account_deleted,
suspended, banned, guest, blocked, other

get.summary: GetUser returns a specific user by their ID

put.summary: UpdateUser updates a user

get.summary: GetBasicInfo retrieves a user's basic information (first name, last name, email)

put.summary:
UpdateBasicInfo updates a user's basic information (first name, last name,
email)

get.summary: GetEnergyAnalytics retrieves the energy analytics for a specific user

energyConsumedKWh.title: Energy consumed in the current session

post.summary:
UpdateEnergyAnalytics updates the energy analytics for a user after a charging
session
InitializeEnergyAnalytics initializes energy analytics for a new user

get.summary:
GetFavouriteStations retrieves all favourite stations for a user with full
station details

delete.summary: RemoveFavouriteStation removes a station from user's favourite stations

post.summary: AddFavouriteStation adds a station to user's favourite stations

delete.summary: DeleteUserImage deletes a user's profile image

get.summary: GetUserImage serves a user's profile image

post.description: Supports JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP, and TIFF formats (auto-detected)
post.summary: UploadUserImage uploads a user's profile image in binary format from mobile app

get.summary: GetInterests retrieves a user's interests

put.summary: UpdateInterests updates a user's interests

get.summary: GetUserNotificationSettings returns a specific user's notification settings

put.summary: UpdateNotificationSettings updates a user's notification settings

get.summary: GetUserRole retrieves a user's role

put.summary: UpdateUserRole updates a user's role (superadmin only)

get.summary: GetUserStatus retrieves a user's status

put.summary: UpdateUserStatus updates a user's status

get.summary: GetVehicles retrieves all vehicles
GetVehicleByID retrieves a specific vehicle by ID

post.summary: SetPrimaryVehicle sets a specific vehicle as primary for a user

get.summary: GetVehiclesByUser retrieves all vehicles for a specific user

post.summary: AddVehicleForUser adds a new vehicle to a user's vehicles

get.summary: GetVehicleTitlesByUser returns only the titles of vehicles for a specific user

delete.summary: DeleteVehicleFromUser deletes a vehicle from a user's vehicles

put.summary: UpdateVehicleForUser updates a vehicle for a specific user

delete.summary: DeleteVehicle deletes a specific vehicle by ID

post.summary: WebhookHandler handles Clerk webhook events
